title: IsabEku iddu
sahitya:
IsabEku idda jayisabEku


anupallavi

  hEsige samsAradalli AsalEsha iDadhAge


caraNam 1    tAmarasa jaladante prEmaviTTu bhavadoLu svAmi rAma enuta pADi kAmita kai kombarella
    caraNam 2    gEru haNNinalli bIja sEridante samsAradi mIriyAse mADadale dhIra krSNana bakutarella
    caraNam 3    mAmsa dAsage matsya siluki himsepaTTa pariyante mOsa hOgadhAge jagadIsha purandara viTTalana nenedu
